title: Average player salary in MLS by team 2018
summary: This bar chart has 23 columns on the x axis representing Team, and Salary in thousand U.S. dollars in each Team on the y axis.
Team Toronto FC has the highest Salary in thousand U.S. dollars and Houston Dynamo has the lowest Salary in thousand U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 706.89 between the maximum Team Toronto FC and minimum Team Houston Dynamo.
